  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.apache.commons.mail.Email.isSSL()
    since 1.3, use Email.isSSLOnConnect() instead.
    org.apache.commons.mail.Email.isTLS()
    since 1.3, use Email.isStartTLSEnabled() instead.
    org.apache.commons.mail.Email.setSocketConnectionTimeout(int)
    Use Email.setSocketConnectionTimeout(Duration).
    org.apache.commons.mail.Email.setSocketTimeout(int)
    Use Email.setSocketTimeout(Duration).
    org.apache.commons.mail.Email.setSSL(boolean)
    since 1.3, use Email.setSSLOnConnect(boolean) instead.
    org.apache.commons.mail.Email.setTLS(boolean)
    since 1.3, use Email.setStartTLSEnabled(boolean) instead.
